description:
Pell`s sacrifice spares his beloved city, but only an act of god can stop the rebellion. With Crocodile`s poison coursing through his body, Luffy musters a final attack against Alabasta`s oppressor.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Will Surpass You! Rain Falls in Arabasta.
Je te battrai ! Il pleut sur Alabasta !
Koeteiku! Arabasta ni Ame ga Furu!
La pioggia è tornata sul regno di Alabasta
Я превзойду тебя! В Алабасте идёт дождь!
ชั้นจะก้าวข้ามแก ฝนตกในอลาบาสต้า
越えていく! アラバスタに雨が降る!
